Platforms Available: PC, PS4, PS5, Xbox One, Xbox Series
Description: The eighth major installment in the Resident Evil series, featuring a village filled with terrifying enemies.

Platforms Available: PC, PS4, PS5, Xbox One, Xbox Series
Description: A cooperative action-adventure game that explores the complexities of relationships, using unique gameplay mechanics.
A return to the series' side-scrolling roots, offering a tense, atmospheric exploration experience.
A roguelike third-person shooter that combines fast-paced combat with a mysterious, ever-changing alien planet.
An interdimensional adventure that showcases the power of the PS5, featuring stunning visuals and innovative gameplay.

Platforms Available: PC, PS4, Xbox One, Xbox Series
Description: A long-awaited sequel offering a deep dive into the human mind, filled with creativity and humor.
An open-world racing game set in a beautifully rendered Mexico, offering a vast array of vehicles and events.
A time-loop shooter where players must use stealth, strategy, and firepower to break the cycle and escape the loop.

Platforms Available: PC, PS4, PS5, Xbox One, Xbox Series
Description: A story-driven RPG that combines traditional Tales gameplay elements with a visually stunning world.
An action-packed hunting game that expands the series with new mechanics, monsters, and a vibrant setting.

Platforms Available: PC, PS4, PS5, Xbox One, Xbox Series
Description: An expansive open-world game combining deep lore with challenging combat, set in the Lands Between.
Follows Kratos and Atreus as they venture into the Nine Realms in the face of the impending Ragnarök.
Aloy ventures into the Forbidden West to uncover the cause of a mysterious blight.

Name of Game: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare II
Platforms Available: PC, PS4, PS5, Xbox One, Xbox Series
Description: A reimagining of the classic Modern Warfare series, featuring both a gripping campaign and dynamic multiplayer modes.
Play as a cat exploring a mysterious, robot-filled city, solving puzzles and unraveling its secrets.
An open-world Pokémon adventure in the new Paldea region, featuring a mix of new and familiar Pokémon.

Name of Game: LEGO Star Wars: The Skywalker Saga
Platforms Available: PC, PS4, PS5, Xbox One, Xbox Series, Switch
Description: The ultimate LEGO Star Wars experience, covering all nine saga films with a unique, humorous twist.
The third installment in the vibrant ink-based shooter series, featuring new modes, weapons, and arenas.
An epic saga set in the fantastical world of Alrest, exploring the interconnected lives of its inhabitants.
A grand strategy game set in the Warhammer fantasy universe, offering expansive battles and deep lore.

Name of Game: The Last of Us Part II
Description: A deeply emotional journey that continues Ellie and Joel's story in a post-apocalyptic world filled with moral complexities and infected creatures.
Escape to a deserted island and create your paradise as you explore, create, and customize in the Animal Crossing: New Horizons game.
Hell’s armies have invaded Earth. Become the Slayer in an epic single-player campaign to conquer demons across dimensions and stop the final destruction of humanity.

In the late 13th century, the Mongol empire has laid waste to entire nations along their campaign to conquer the East. Tsushima Island is all that stands between mainland Japan and a massive Mongol invasion fleet led by the cunning and ruthless general, Khotun Khan.
Defy the god of the dead as you hack and slash out of the Underworld in this rogue-like dungeon crawler from the creators of Bastion, Transistor, and Pyre.
A brutal exploration and survival game for 1-10 players set in a procedurally-generated purgatory inspired by Viking culture.

Platforms Available: PC, PS4, PS5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X/S, Stadia
Description: Fight for freedom against a dictator and his son in the tropical paradise of Yara in this guerrilla revolution.
Engage in a massive, open-world MMO filled with danger and opportunity where you'll forge a new destiny for yourself as an adventurer shipwrecked on the supernatural island of Aeternum.
A challenging journey into the heart of Japan’s late 1500s, combining ninja stealth with visceral combat.
A player-driven story set in a sci-fi universe, with deep character customization and impactful choices.
From legendary game creator Hideo Kojima comes an all-new, genre-defying experience.
A visually stunning third-person action-adventure that will keep you on the edge of your seat.
A new action-adventure game that tells an original Star Wars story about a surviving Padawan set shortly after the events of Star Wars: Episode III - Revenge of the Sith.
A free-to-play Battle Royale game where legendary competitors battle for glory, fame, and fortune on the fringes of the Frontier.
A turn-based tactical RPG that lets you control a character who is hired to teach at a prestigious academy, influencing the fate of a continent on the verge of war.
Luigi's dream vacation turns into a ghostly—and gooey— nightmare in Luigi's Mansion 3!

The world is crumbling. The Swarm has corrupted the Coalition's robot army and is descending upon human cities. With danger closing in, Kait Diaz breaks away to uncover her connection to the enemy and discovers the true danger to Sera – herself.
The original shooter-looter returns, packing bazillions of guns and a mayhem-fueled adventure!
Kratos and his son Atreus set out on a deeply personal quest into the Norse wilds, fighting gods and monsters to fulfill a promise to his deceased wife.
An epic tale of life in America at the dawn of the modern age, following Arthur Morgan and the Van der Linde gang as they flee across the heartland of America.
Swing through vibrant neighborhoods and defeat villains as the iconic Spider-Man in this original storyline inspired by the comic books.
Hunters traverse a new world packed with surprises and excitement, engaging in epic battles against fearsome monsters.
Help Madeline survive her inner demons on her journey to the top of Celeste Mountain in this super-tight, hand-crafted platformer.
Embark on an epic journey in ancient Greece to become a legendary Spartan hero.
The ultimate fighting game featuring all past Super Smash Bros. characters and numerous stages from the series history.
Explore a near-future world where androids live alongside humans. Every choice you make affects the outcome of the game.
Experience dynamic seasons in a shared open-world while exploring beautiful scenery in over 450 cars.

Travel the globe and track your targets across exotic sandbox locations in HITMAN™ 2. From sun-drenched streets to dark and dangerous rainforests, nowhere is safe from the world's most creative assassin, Agent 47.

Name of Game: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild
Description: An open-world adventure across the vast kingdom of Hyrule, as Link awakens from a deep sleep to find a world in ruin.
Aloy embarks on a quest to uncover her past and discover her destiny in a world overrun by robotic creatures.
Players live a double life as a high school student and a phantom thief, exploring the metaverse to change the hearts of corrupt adults.
A classic run-and-gun action game heavily focused on boss battles, inspired by cartoons of the 1930s.
Mario embarks on a new journey through unknown worlds, running and jumping through huge 3D worlds in the first sandbox-style Mario game since Super Mario 64 and Super Mario Sunshine.
A battle royale shooter that pits 100 players against each other in a struggle for survival. Gather supplies and outwit your opponents to become the last person standing.
Follow the story of androids 2B, 9S, and A2 as they reclaim the machine-driven dystopia overrun by powerful machines.
A journey into myth and madness set in the Viking age. A broken Celtic warrior embarks on a haunting vision quest into Viking Hell to fight for the soul of her dead lover.
Experience horror like never before in Resident Evil 7. Step into the new Isolated View and feel the horror close from every angle.

Average Completion Time: 12-50 hours (main story), Endless (with expansions and multiplayer)
Description: Engage in epic PvE and PvP battles in the sequel to Destiny. Explore the mysteries of the solar system and unleash elemental abilities against powerful enemies.
A team-based multiplayer first-person shooter where heroes do battle in a world of conflict.
The final journey in the brutal and challenging Dark Souls series, where players face fearsome enemies and environments.

Name of Game: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt - Blood and Wine
Price: Expansion; requires base game ($50 for the complete edition)
Description: An expansion to The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt that takes Geralt to the land of Toussaint, a remote valley untouched by war, where he uncovers the dark secret behind a beast terrorizing the kingdom.
Relentless demons, impossibly destructive guns, and fast, fluid movement provide the foundation for intense, first-person combat.
Nathan Drake embarks on a globe-trotting journey in pursuit of a historical conspiracy behind a fabled pirate treasure.
Join Prince Noctis and his closest friends on a grand journey to reclaim his kingdom from an invading empire.

Platforms Available: PC, PS4, Xbox One, Switch, Mobile
Description: Inherit a dilapidated farm, and turn it into a thriving home. Grow crops, raise animals, mine ores, and become part of the community.
A dark, narrative-driven platformer combining intense action with challenging puzzles. It has won several awards for its art direction and game design.
Pilot and Titan unite as never before in a highly anticipated sequel featuring a critically acclaimed single-player campaign.
Experience the dawn of all-out war in Battlefield 1. Discover a world at war through an adventure-filled campaign, or join in epic multiplayer battles with up to 64 players.
Geralt of Rivia sets out on a quest to find the child of prophecy in a vast open world rich with merchant cities, dangerous mountain passes, and forgotten caverns to explore.
Face your fears in this dangerous new world where danger, death, and madness lurk around every corner.
As the sole survivor of Vault 111, you enter a world destroyed by nuclear war. Every second is a fight for survival, and every choice is yours.

Name of Game: Metal Gear Solid V: The Phantom Pain
Platforms Available: PC, PS3, PS4, Xbox 360, Xbox One
Description: Snake, aka Big Boss, awakes from a nine year coma to lead a new mercenary group, Diamond Dogs, and pursue revenge on those who destroyed his forces and came close to killing him.

Soccer meets driving in this physics-based multiplayer-focused sequel to Supersonic Acrobatic Rocket-Powered Battle-Cars! Choose a variety of high-flying vehicles equipped with huge rocket boosters to score amazing aerial goals and pull off incredible game-changing saves.

Platforms Available: PC, PS4, Xbox One, Switch, Vita
Description: A unique RPG where you don't have to destroy anyone. In this game, you control a human who falls underground into the world of monsters. Now you must find your way out... or stay trapped forever.

Platforms Available: PC, PS3, PS4, Xbox 360, Xbox One, iOS, Android
Description: Follow the story of Max Caulfield, a photography senior who discovers she can rewind time while saving her best friend Chloe Price. The pair soon find themselves investigating the mysterious disappearance of fellow student Rachel Amber, uncovering a dark side to life in Arcadia Bay.

A modern take on the classic city simulation. The game introduces new gameplay elements to realize the thrill and hardships of creating and maintaining a real city whilst expanding on some well-established tropes of the city building experience.
A visually stunning action-platformer that tells the tale of a young orphan destined for heroics, through a visually stunning action-platformer crafted by Moon Studios.
A video game about a woman talking to the police. Players search through a database of video clips from fictional police interviews, and piece together the story of a woman whose husband disappeared.

Modern Warfare III picks up immediately after the events of Modern Warfare II. Join Captain Price and Task Force 141 as they face off against the ultimate threat, ultranationalist Vladimir Makarov. Open Combat Missions: New Open Combat Missions redefine the traditional Campaign level.

Battlefield 2042 marks the return to the iconic all-out warfare of the franchise. Adapt and overcome dynamically-changing battlegrounds with the help of your squad and a cutting-edge arsenal. With support for 128 players, prepare for unprecedented scale on vast environments.

Halo is set in the twenty-sixth century, with the player assuming the role of the Master Chief, a cybernetically enhanced supersoldier. The Chief is accompanied by Cortana, an artificial intelligence. Players battle aliens as they attempt to uncover the secrets of the eponymous Halo, a ring-shaped artificial world.

EA SPORTS FC is here—the next chapter in The World's Game. Join us in building the future of football on a foundation of innovation and authenticity with more than 19,000 fully licensed players, 700 teams, and 30 leagues.

Packed with pure, authentic hoops action, NBA 2K24 boasts a variety of single-player and multiplayer game modes for you to immerse yourself in. Realize your NBA dreams in MyCAREER, assemble a dream team of your favorite players in MyTEAM, put on your General Manager cap in MyNBA, and play as today's stars in Play Now.

The game features a narrative mode with live-action scenes similar to Grid Legends. F1 23 features overhauled driving physics and added the option to set a 35% race distance. Red flags, which last appeared in F1 2014, make an appearance.
